subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mike Hart ran for 153 yards on a career-high 44 carries and scored early in the fourth quarter yesterday, leading Michigan to a 14-9 victory against No. 10 Penn State.
snippet: Mike Hart ran for 153 yards on a career-high 44 carries and scored early in the fourth quarter yesterday, leading Michigan to a 14-9 victory against No. 10 Penn State.
